mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NAEMEMBER(MEMBERSEQ, EMAIL, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, INTRODUCE, PHONE, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, AUTH, USERSTATUS, MENTORTIER, LOGINCNT, REPORTCNT, JOINDATE, MENTEECNT, MENTEEACCSTAR, BYEBYE) VALUES(MEMBERSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{introduce}, #{phone}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, 'E', 'A', '', 0, 0, SYSDATE, 0, 0, 'N')
